thread.title: Coca-Cola Super Bowl 2017 Commercial: 'Together is Beautiful'
thread.title_full: Coca-Cola Super Bowl 2017 Commercial: 'Together is Beautiful'

author: Just Jared
title: Coca-Cola Super Bowl 2017 Commercial: 'Together is Beautiful'
text:
Coca-Cola is re-sharing an important message with their Super Bowl commercial .
The soda company re-released a 2014 commercial of theirs during tonight’s 2017 Super Bowl.
Their commercial has the iconic “American the Beautiful” playing in the background as it’s sang in a different language and takes a journey around the world to showcase people of all different races, genders, and sexuality.
Coca-Cola re-released this commercial because their company wants to continue to “promote optimism, inclusion, and humanity – the values that bring us closer together.”

Coca-Cola Super Bowl Commercial 2017
